enable-summaries.name: Enable Summaries
enable-summaries.hint: Enable summary functionality for SWADE characters

selected-characters.name: Additional Characters
selected-characters.hint: Connected player characters are shown automatically. Use this to add extra characters (comma-separated names or IDs) like NPCs or absent player characters.

button-position.name: Button Position
button-position.hint: Position of the summary button on screen

characters-per-row.name: Characters Per Row
characters-per-row.hint: Number of character cards to display per row (1-3)

ui-style.name: UI Style
ui-style.hint: Choose the visual style for the character summary interface

ui.no-characters-selected: No characters to display. Connect players with assigned characters or add character names/IDs in module settings.
